about_the_game:
Welcome to the Lou’s Lagoon Demo! 

Your Uncle Lou has disappeared and left his delivery service in your hands, so now it’s up to you to keep the business afloat – In this small gameplay slice, you can get the feel of what life is like running a seaplane delivery business in the lush and vibrant Limbo Archipelago. 🌴 

Explore Lou’s Island 

There’s plenty to do to get Lou’s island back in business! With your trusty Swirler 2000 in hand, repair structures, meet quirky residents, and take on deliveries to turn the island into a peaceful paradise. 🌞🌊 

Create Your Character 

Your island, your style! Customize your character—from hair color to facial details like stars on your cheeks. Bring your own flair to the island and make it your own!! ✨✂️ 

Take to the Skies 

Your Uncle Lou’s seaplane is your gateway to adventure. Whether you’re testing your piloting skills in tricky flying challenges or just gliding over the waves to soak in the scenery, the skies are yours to explore. 🛩️☁️ 

Note: While the demo is playable with mouse and keyboard, we recommend you use a controller for the best experience. 

A little heads-up: this demo is currently available only in English and Simplified Chinese. We're planning to add more languages next time around − thanks for your understanding! 🙏

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100F or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or similar (4 GB VRAM)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1660 SUPER or similar (6+ GB VRAM)

short_description: Traverse the vibrant Limbo Archipelago in search of your Uncle Lou, who mysteriously disappeared and left you his seaplane delivery service. Explore the islands, harvest resources, and hone your crafting skills to complete jobs and grow your business!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
